channel.title: Howdy on Jens Rantil
channel.description: Recent content in Howdy on Jens Rantil

item.title: That initial blogpost
item.description:
So it’s time to kick off this blog. I cheated a little and posted a previously written blog post. It was posted on a personal blog that mostly had Swedish material.

My intent with this blog will be to “put a URL on my tech and possibly entrepreneurship thoughts, in English”. If you’d like to know more about me, check out that brand new About Me page!
